00183 inline CVector3d CVector3d::operator/(double scalar) const
00184 {
00185        if (::fabs(scalar) < I_BIG_EPSILON){
00186               scalar = (scalar > 0)? I_BIG_EPSILON: -I_BIG_EPSILON;
00187        }
00188 
00189        return CVector3d(GetX() / scalar, GetY() / scalar, GetZ() / scalar);
00190 }
